about.title: About Service
about.faqDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about our service and its features. Learn how to use your subscription and enjoy discounts.
about.helpDescription: Get in touch with us if you have questions or suggestions. Our support team is ready to assist you promptly.
about.termsDescription: Read our terms of use and understand your rights and obligations as a user of our service.
about.billingDescription: Manage your subscription, view your billing history, and download invoices.
about.qrDescription: Recommendations for using QRs and links to our service to get your customers to join the service faster and support your business with subscriptions.
about.shareDescription: Get in touch with us if you have questions or suggestions. Our support team is ready to assist you promptly.

help.title: Need help?
help.subtitle: Write or call us - we help you!
help.messagePlaceholder: Hi! I wanna say - your are cool team!

faq.howItWorks: How does our loyalty service work?
faq.howItWorksAnswer: Our loyalty service rewards you for shopping at participating stores. Earn points with every purchase and redeem them for exclusive rewards and discounts.
faq.whichStores: Which stores are part of the program?
faq.whichStoresAnswer: We have partnerships with a wide range of retailers, from local shops to major brands. Check our store directory for a complete list of participating locations.
faq.subscriptionPlansAnswer: We offer several subscription tiers to suit different needs, from basic to premium plans. Each plan includes different benefits and reward rates.
faq.howToSubscribeAnswer: You can subscribe via the website or app by choosing the plan that suits you. Payments are charged automatically on a monthly basis.
faq.howToCancel: How can I cancel my subscription?
faq.howToCancelAnswer: You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. The service will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to [Your Service Name]! By using our platform, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. If you don't agree, you should not use our service.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Our platform provides users with access to discounts and special offers at partner stores through a subscription plan. The discounts are subject to the terms set by each participating partner.

registration.title: 3. User Registration and Subscription
registration.item1: Users must create an account to access our service.
registration.item2: Subscription fees are charged on a monthly basis, with payments processed automatically.
registration.item3: Users are responsible for maintaining up-to-date payment information.

freeTrial.title: 4. Free Trial and Cancellation
freeTrial.item1: If offered, the free trial allows users to access the service for a limited time without charge.
freeTrial.item2: Subscriptions can be canceled at any time via the user's account settings. Access to discounts will remain until the end of the billing period.

partnerOffers.title: 5. Partner Offers and Availability
partnerOffers.item1: Discounts and offers vary by partner and are subject to change without prior notice.
partnerOffers.item2: Availability of offers may differ based on location or other conditions defined by partners.

userResponsibilities.title: 6. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.item1: Users must use the service lawfully and in accordance with these Terms.
userResponsibilities.item2: Sharing account information or unauthorized use of the service is prohibited.
userResponsibilities.item3: Users are responsible for ensuring their actions align with the terms of each partner offer.

refunds.title: 7. Refunds and Payment Issues
refunds.item1: Subscription fees are non-refundable unless otherwise required by law.
refunds.item2: If a payment fails, access to the service may be restricted until the issue is resolved.

links.title: Links
links.description: You can use this link for social media posts or to tell your customers about participating in our loyalty program and attract more people to your subscriptions.

qrs.title: QRs
qrs.description: You can print out a QR code for registration in our service and place it in a visible place near the cash register. This will make it easier and faster for your customers to register in the service and sign up for your discounts.

BusinessDashboard.cannotDeleteActiveSubscription: You cannot delete an active subscription.
BusinessDashboard.errorDeletingSubscription: An error occurred while deleting the subscription.

faq.howItWorks: How does our loyalty service work?
faq.howItWorksAnswer: Our loyalty service rewards you for shopping at participating stores. Earn points with every purchase and redeem them for exclusive rewards and discounts.
faq.whichStores: Which stores are part of the program?
faq.whichStoresAnswer: We have partnerships with a wide range of retailers, from local shops to major brands. Check our store directory for a complete list of participating locations.
faq.subscriptionPlansAnswer: We offer several subscription tiers to suit different needs, from basic to premium plans. Each plan includes different benefits and reward rates.
faq.howToSubscribeAnswer: You can subscribe via the website or app by choosing the plan that suits you. Payments are charged automatically on a monthly basis.
faq.howToCancel: How can I cancel my subscription?
faq.howToCancelAnswer: You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. The service will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
faq.noDiscount: What should I do if I don't see a discount in the store?
faq.noDiscountAnswer: If you don't see your discount applied, please verify your subscription status and contact our support team for immediate assistance.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to our loyalty service. By using our service, you agree to these terms and conditions in full.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: We provide a loyalty platform that connects local businesses with customers, enabling subscriptions and exclusive benefits.

registration.title: 3. Registration and Subscription
registration.item1: You must provide accurate and complete information during registration.
registration.item2: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.

freeTrial.title: 4. Free Trial and Cancellation
freeTrial.item1: We offer a free trial period for new users.
freeTrial.item2: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account.

partnerOffers.title: 5. Partner Offers
partnerOffers.item1: Offers and discounts are subject to availability.
partnerOffers.item2: Specific terms for each offer may vary by partner.

userResponsibilities.title: 6. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.item1: Users must use the service lawfully and in accordance with these terms.
userResponsibilities.item2: Sharing account information or unauthorized use of the service is prohibited.
userResponsibilities.item3: Users are responsible for ensuring their actions align with the terms of each offer.

refunds.title: 7. Refunds and Payment Issues
refunds.item1: Subscription fees are non-refundable unless required by law.
refunds.item2: If a payment fails, access to the service may be restricted until the issue is resolved.
